website_summaries.verdict: This hose costs more than some other choices, but it provides excellent longevity and even water distribution.
pros: Thicker material is more reliable over time
Versatile: sprays upward on one side and soaks on the other side
cons: May leak near the connector area

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for watering a  long narrow strip.
customer_reviews.text: I've added two of these with a 25 foot section and can now water the edge of my driveway all together. The spray is very fine, sometimes hard to see but it does a great job of spreading the water evenly. The photo is the reason I needed a new hose.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I was skeptical and it does take a little work to straighten the hose out but it works really well. My only problem is that I didn’t realize it was at Home Depot for half the price! I usually check around first but this time I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: hosejockey

customer_reviews.title: Produce to work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hose on July 17, 2018 to water our foundation round our house. Turned the hose on today January 24, 2019 and it has a hole in it that will not let us complete the watering of the side of the house. You would think for the price we pay this item should last more than 7 months. This item has a 7 year WARRANTY but you give no instruction of how we can get exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia J. Francis

customer_reviews.title: so good. No leaks
customer_reviews.text: Have 5 of these in use for 1 1/2 months for watering a new hedge. So far, so good. No leaks, no failures. You do need a u-shaped to hold the hose in the right orientation : white stripe side up for spray, down for soaking. Connected to a Rain Bird 1ZEHTMR Professional Grade Electronic Hose End Timer/Controller, One Zone/Station, Battery Operated on a spigot for control.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Peek

customer_reviews.title: Miss the Old-Fashioned soaker hoses
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for the “old fashioned” soaker hose. This is the closest I could find. The middle doesn’t seem to spray out as well as the ends. I’ve picked out little plastic pieces that seemed to be blocking some of the holes. This is annoying. Also, the hose flips over often in the middle. Someone suggested using landscaping U pins, which would probably work, but I haven’t tried and frankly don’t feel like spending extra time doing so. I don’t recall ever having to do so with the soaker hoses we grew up with.
customer_reviews.author: KD Roach

customer_reviews.title: A better alternative to a bargain priced sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: A heavier duty version of the sprinkler hose. The hose is a thicker plastic and the connector is much better than those found on the bargain brands. I bought two of these last year for the gardens and haven’t had a problem with them so I bought another for the front yard his spring.
customer_reviews.author: txbbc

customer_reviews.title: Solid sprinkling/watering performance
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than a typical black rubber soaker hose. The water sprays about 1-2’ into the air in and around the plantings and trees in our landscaping. You’ll need land scaping spikes to keep it in place once you lay it among your plantings.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G. Depot

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: On the description it states very clearly that this product is made in the USA, this is a lie it was made in Taiwan.
customer_reviews.author: BONEDRY

customer_reviews.title: Tried all kinds of sprinklers and just don’t like any of them much
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hose about a month ago to use on my vegetable garden. It is the thing I’ve found to water my garden. Tried all kinds of sprinklers and just don’t like any of them much. This sprinkler hose is great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good spot waterer
customer_reviews.text: this hose is ideal for the side of the yard between houses. You just have to be picky about allowing the striped side to face up, and be sure to remove it when you mow. It lasted one season so far. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkle it does!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research, I decided to purchase the Swan sprinkle /soaker hose..and am happy to report that it's doing the job superbly! It has been super hot here in Central Virginia and having our new planting watered well is important. The only thing I needed to purchase were some landscape pins, and there are a few places that the hose rolls... not a big deal as it's very lightweight and easy to move around... but we needed sprinkler action. Another happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: M. Caldrono

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: it’s so ’lightweight’ that it won’t even stay where it’s supposed to or on the right side. i have to put rocks to hold it in place all over the yard. most of the spray is only on one side, like the holes are drilled correctly or evenly. some of the holes send out a stream several feet while others midway in the hose barely work at all. if i could return this piece of junk i would, but of course by the time you really get to try it out in hopes the holes would start to spray better, now it’s to late to return. get a sprinkler, this is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kay Cedillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had gotten a soaker hose previously and was unimpressed. this one is great. It can be placed face up or down depending on your watering needs. Down directs the water directly into the earth for a good soaking of roots. up causes the water to spray about two feet into the air, each hole aiming in a slightly different direction for great coverage for plants that need their foliage watered. This was also one of the few I could find at this length and it is completely worth the price. The far end is threaded with a cap so you could add another hose or soaker to the end for more length.
customer_reviews.author: S. Muzyczek

customer_reviews.title: Best way to water your plants
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these in the fifty foot length for 4 different beds- a newly planted rose hedge in addition to 3 other narrow beds along a sidewalk. I put2 facing up and ancored an 2 facing down as soakers. I cannot be more pleased. Consistent water dispersed for the entire length with far less waste of water where mot wanted. Now I just hook up a connector to the spigot once a week, andeverything is freshly watered without damaging flowers.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good quality hose, but...
customer_reviews.text: After several uses, some holes in the end near the hose fitting enlarged and then the distribution was uneven. I did not apply excess water pressure. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I remember buying sprinkler hoses way back when. They were terrible; a tangled up cheap mess! This one had very few tangles when I stretched it out. Looks durable; should last a long time. Would recommend purchasing a bag of landscaping staples to keep around. You can use them to put this hose exactly where you want. I use them all over the garden and yard. They're made of steel so will give plants a dose of iron as they deteriorate.
customer_reviews.author: Eighthof8

customer_reviews.title: Soaker hoses don’t work- that’s why there are few in stores
customer_reviews.text: We kept trying to make these work 200’ to spray 190’ of yard across. Never did work. One end would lay flat and the other end up like I wanted.A daily battle with them until I unplugged them and put them in a garden cart figuring I had to get this grass growing rather than play around with hoses that didn’t work. One more hundred dollars down the drain as I put them on the street for the garbage. It has become 6 weeks since I purchased them. I ordered some separate hoses I put on sprinklers to tackle the job.
customer_reviews.author: janet lozon

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I decided to use it instead of a standard soaker hose in my backyard and all the plants and shrubs are doing way better than the ones in the front with the other kind. Only issue with it is it’s nearly impossible to patch if it gets any cut or hole
customer_reviews.author: GadgetHound

customer_reviews.title: Works very well but do not link more than two 50' sections together.
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler hose performed according to expectations but I found that when adding a third 50' section the water pressure dropped to the point where barely any water was emitted. Two 50' sections linked together worked fine so I simply connected a Y adapter to the hose and alternately turn on either the 100' double section or the 50' single section to accomplish the desired area of coverage.
customer_reviews.author: KathyRS

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Big leak in the first few inches of the hose that I noticed in a test run. Looked like a deep scuff. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Now I know why stores don't sell these any more. Uneven water distribution.
customer_reviews.text: These work for my intended purpose. But the perforations in the hose vary with some shooting a stream of water 10 feet high while others are just a dribble. Luckily, even water distribution is not high on my priority list.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a soaker hose for this hose
customer_reviews.text: I was using a soaker hose, but my garden was still looking too dry and my plants were not thriving. So, I replaced the soaker hose with this sprinkler hose. What a big difference! My plants are getting more water and looking great! Plus the soaker hoses fall apart too easily. This hose is a typical hose so I am thinking it will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: iteachmom

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for quality...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a good quality soaker not made with recycled rubber . Not nearly a quality product. Extremely lightweight, "recycled"?. Nothing like what I hoped. USA made? I doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Effective & versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a couple of years ago. It was great, made well & the water spray covered almost 3 ft. on either side. I have some gardens that border the fence, This type of sprinkling covered a good distance. So rather than continually moving them around, I ordered 8" staples to hold them in place and I ordered 3 more sections of hose.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: One worked and one didn’t.
customer_reviews.text: The 50 ft sprinkler hose split and the water did not come out where the small holes should be. The 30 foot hose works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked once.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two hoses. Used them one time worked ok. Second time on one hose there were two holes opened up bigger than the rest and dump prob 50% off the water out of those two holes. Will try and tape or repair but most likely end up returning the burst one. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PWP

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a mister. The spray is very light and only shoots upwards. Does not sprinkle the yard at all. Great if you have kids wanting to run through a mist in the summer . Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Island girl

customer_reviews.title: Works great, bought two and ran then end to end
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a sprinkler hose to water the garden, and it does the job nicely. I just spray around the house with 30% vinegar to kill off the weeds so it stays clear of obstructions. Keeps waters the garden, not the surrounding lawn and trees, like the oscillator was doing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Neumiller

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Wound so tight middle of till is kinked and water flow is a trickle. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: robert frostTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 24 hrs.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it when we set it up yesterday. This seemed like a good quality product with good reviews. I got up this morning to it on and there were 2 leaks and now it is useless. I will be returning it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TGZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-built sprinkler hose.
customer_reviews.text: Wanting a drip soaker hose and accidentally bought this sprinkler hose. It works fine but the holes come out of one side and in trying to manipulate which way the water streams are pointing towards, I get pretty wet. Shut off valve far from where I’m running hose. But still, I like it enough. It’s made well and should last a long time. Very reasonable price too. Just need to shut off the water before moving hose around. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, uneven spray
customer_reviews.text: Only laid it down today. Make sure you have metal stakes to hold it in place. So far I'm finding that the water flow is uneven. Sprays high at the end closest to the hookup, not as strong closer to the middle and end. Think it will be adequate for my needs but time will tell. Lightweight and lays down pretty easily (with stakes!).
customer_reviews.author: pregnantbuddha

customer_reviews.title: Decent water pressure required
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize I don't have decent water pressure, which is definitely needed for this. I wasn't able to use it but I have seen a few houses near by that use them and they look like they work great.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: It lays out flat the way you want it. Others I've used would not do that. I use it as a sprinkler hose to cover areas in the lawn that sprinklers don't reach. It works great for that. I'm disappointed to see this is no longer sold. I ordered another type that doesn't work as well.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: A good soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new one of these. I ordered here to avoid going to walmart. Even if cheaper there. These are good soakers. They dont weather as poorly as the black ones. The water sprays better and wider as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality flat sprinkler hose !
customer_reviews.text: Yes I finally found a good flat spraying 50' hose. It's great for long areas that are too narrow for a traditional sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: jonna foster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a month and I absolutely love it. It's very light weight so I can change it easily and I have not had any leakage problems. I got the 50 ft and towards the end of the line it does diminish in pressure but I use that to my advantage. It easily connects to other hoses.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Montoya

customer_reviews.title: LIghtweight soaker hose can either spray a 5 foot area or soak directly under the hose
customer_reviews.text: The Swan soaker hoses are really great for watering linear areas where you can control the amount of water used. These hoses seem to hold up well and work for soaking rows of plants or treas without any fuss. I can't think io a better product to do the job these hoses do.
customer_reviews.author: Brewer's (.

customer_reviews.title: great soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because it was rubber ... will see how it lasts, but so far it is working as expected. I like that the both ends can be attached to another hose/soaker to extend. So far use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Toniellyn

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This hose is such small diameter that it barely puts out any water.
customer_reviews.author: cheue444

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler/soaker
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted it todo - doesn't work well if a curve is involved, just keep it straight.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Best Sprinkler Hose
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprinkler hose. I use it in my raised vegetable beds. The only issue is it only sprays on one side of the center line. But, for my application is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Soaker vs Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Some holes are small enough to serve as soaker. Other holes are large and serve as a spray sprinkler. Overall, not the best soaker hose because the big holes rut the ground and don't allow water pressure to evenly disperse through length of hose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: Great does the job and I think they were a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Hester C. Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for watering my narrow border in my backyard. It doesn’t water thru my neighbors fence either.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker 2

customer_reviews.title: 50 foot soaker/sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: Good quality - have been using it about a week. Striped side up=sprinkler (down=soaker). Nice, fine spray. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Work well for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased (3) of these. I like that they're light weight and have rotating connections for adjusting, but they're A whole channel narrower (and just not the same quality) as my (20) year old flat hose. I would buy again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would’ve found this one over the other ones I’ve been using. It’s the best one I’ve got so far. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Maefield

customer_reviews.title: Waters very well.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a hard time finding quality soaker or sprinkler hoses. This is one of my favorites. It waters my flowerbed quite well
customer_reviews.author: C. Kroeker

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk - only initial 6 to 10 holes spray. Rest of holes either just weep a few drips or release no water at all. Contacted manufacturer - if they provide working item to me at no cost will rerate accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I ordered I dint realize it's sprinkler hose but I do have a garden bed where I am using it. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rupesh Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Bought three. Two were fine. Third one had huge leak and went into trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: badgering

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The second time I used it it got a hole in the side of it. Not durable. Used duct tape on it. Certainly not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bun

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: It works as promised and it is a very effective way to water a big lawn. I bought two and connected them in order to cover the entire lawn.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Don't work very well.
customer_reviews.text: These are stiff and don't lay nicely and no water comes out towards the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Save Time Watering
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, functional product at a very good price. It makes watering a large area of plants much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Great solution!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful solution for the side of our house where we don't have sprinklers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Like the weighty construction and the color. It blends in well with landscaping. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler/soaker.
customer_reviews.text: 100 times better than the one I previously ordered. Good quality. Like one we had when young.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Agreat irrigation tool.
customer_reviews.text: Delivers a full mist of water across a large area of the lawn. Makes watering the grass a very easy task. Hose is very easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Carver G. Barney

customer_reviews.title: Soaks a narrow strip over hose only.
customer_reviews.text: The spray of the sprinkler doesn’t span out. It’s literally just a thin strip right over the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Quality soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice quality soaker hose. If you use it on one side, it sprays water up, the other side, it works like a soaker hose. Very important to have one of these if you have a hedge or plantings in hot, dry weather ike we're experiencing in the Northeast. Reasonable compared to national name-brand stores so a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Flaura

customer_reviews.title: Great way to water long, narrow strips
customer_reviews.text: I have used this hose every day for the last week. The hose fitting is of good quality. The hose was stiff initially but relaxed once the sun warmed it up. It sprays a fine mist evenly on both sides. I get 2-3 feet of coverage on each side, depending on the water pressure and the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bothwell

customer_reviews.title: This hose works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this hose. In fact want to purchase another 50' to add on to the 50' I Worksrecently purchased.
customer_reviews.author: labdad

customer_reviews.title: AVERAGE PRODUCT?
customer_reviews.text: HOSE IS VERY HEAVY BUT I AM SURE IT WILL LEND TO DURABILITY. NOT SURE HOW WELL IT WATERS...VERY LOW SPRAY COMING FROM HOSE. TIME WILL TELL.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Bey

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, tested it and it worked as advertised, how long it last, time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Bob. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 more. Now if Omaha USPS dosent continue to cancel my orders I’ll probably get more.
customer_reviews.author: micole

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: Used it to water a big long patch of grass seed. Worked great. Next spring goes in the garden
customer_reviews.author: William T. Laffond

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule. Newly planted lawn enjoying it's drink. Already sprouted after one week....
customer_reviews.author: Al Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Not a sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: This is not a sprinkler it is a mister and the width is about 3 feet it is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger N. Brinkhaus

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I needed it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sprinkler! I can turn it on and leave it and it does exactly what I need. I'm
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Stedham

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to putting in a sprinkler system. It is easy to move, water comes out evenly, keeps our grass well watered.
customer_reviews.author: wendy ann

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this soaker hose yet, but I am sure it will serve my purpose. The truth is that I tried two brick and mortar stores to purchase one, and both did not have them in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: This hose is great, one side is drip the other is sprinkle. Nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new soaker hose for my garden. This looks good and the price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'C

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: just like I was a kid many years ago, this hose has the same high quality.
customer_reviews.author: rcstot

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler soaker hose
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put into my flower/bush bed and worked the way expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that you can use this as a drip or a sprinkler. I needed something that would keep my slab foundation moist, not soaked, that kept the water localized. Perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this long enough to vouch for it's durability, but it appears to be well-made and it totally works great. We use the sprinkler side and it covers the entire length of the garden evenly and thoroughly. We'll definitely buy another when we get our other garden finished!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: It Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Using for controlled watering of new sod and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dave A Walter

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good hose, but it has a lot of leaks.
customer_reviews.author: O.Bqwiet

customer_reviews.title: does not spray evenly
customer_reviews.text: only one fourth (at the end away from the inlet) did the hose spray on both sides. the remainder only sprayed on one side and sparsely. also the inlet leaked without 2 washers.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these just in case and they are great. Depending on your water pressure will determine how high the sprays get. Mine reaches about 5'-6' ft upward, using two of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Shontae L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it but seems to be working out
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Agee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sprinkler!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sprinkler for narrow park of yard. Delivers a light mist that soaks into ground quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Christy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I have a few of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far its working at advertised. The first time I used it I needed to apply a few U shaped metal garden spikes to hold it in place as it would not lie flat.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Great soaker hose.
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as described and worked wonderfully for us.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t buy these in stores anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted to water a row of trees and landscape plants.
customer_reviews.author: Wesla

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler hose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hose to water my roses....it works perfectly....its very lightweight and easy to work with...
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for what we needed! Has an abundance of spray perdect amount. We needed more than a soaker hose and this worked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ski Diva

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too pleased with this vapor water spray product... Slightest wind and the spray vapor goes south...
customer_reviews.author: Bobbymac

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but a little stiff
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of the other hoses first and they tore at the hose attachment. This one is made of much heavier materials so it should last much longer without tearing. It is a little stiff so it's hard to make corners without it twisting, but it worked well if I used rocks to hold it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard R.

customer_reviews.title: easy to work with and lasts .
customer_reviews.text: These hoses are great to work with and do a great job. However, this will be the first Northcentral Minnesota winter for the one I bought Last year. hopefully, it survived the cold and will continue to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marolyn

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff
customer_reviews.text: Quality material but really stiff and hard to get to lay flat unless it's been out in the hot sun to loosen up. I like the swivel connection a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy another hose because the old one only lasted me the summer because of the heat made the holes even bigger so too much water was coming out to fast. Other then that it's great. I purchased a new one see how long this one lasts??
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler hose was as expected and works fine. Next day I saw the same hose in a local hardware store for $8.00 less (35%) .
customer_reviews.author: Donald H Wernsing

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I placed this 50' length on newly placed grass seed in the parking strip between the sidewalk and street. It creates a spray about 5' tall and covers approx. 4 ' wide if on full force. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and leaks easily occur.
customer_reviews.text: This garden hose is a piece of junk. Within a day of purchasing it, the hose sprung a leak which I repaired with some super glue and duct tape. Unfortunately, when one leak was repaired, another leak occurred. After five leaks in about 2 months, I just trashed it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Ferrier

customer_reviews.title: Makes watering easier
customer_reviews.text: I just love my hose. Makes watering so much eadier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
